meanings.sent1: She impledged to always be there for her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The impledged gift brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent3: He impledged to never eat another cookie, but couldn't resist the temptation.
meanings.sent4: The impledged commitment was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The impledged vow echoed through the halls.

meanings.definition: Committed or obligated to do something
meanings.sent1: The impledged team worked hard to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent2: She felt impledged to help her community in any way she could.
meanings.sent3: The impledged student promised to study, but ended up watching TV all night.
meanings.sent4: His impledged dedication shone through in every task he undertook.
meanings.sent5: The impledged promise was etched in his mind forever.
